alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 5:30PM EST until January 17 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 to 20 below zero. * WHERE...Chautauqua and Cattaraugus counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 AM EST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 1 AM to 10 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media. This is a potentially dangerous situation to be outdoors. If you must be outside, be sure to cover all exposed skin. Frostbite can occur in 30 minutes or less with apparent temperatures of 15 below zero or colder.
